questions.question: Tell me a fun fact.
questions.answer: Mercury takes 59 days to make a rotation but only 88 days to circle the Sun.  That means that there are fewer than 2 days in a year!

questions.question: Tell me a fun fact something about mars!
questions.answer: Mars is the home of "Olympus Mons", the largest volcano found in the solar system.  It stands about 27 kilometers high with a crater 81 kilometers wide.

questions.question: Tell me a fun fact something about Jupiter.
questions.answer:
Jupiter is the largest planet in the solar system, but it spins very quickly on its axis.  
A day on Jupiter lasts only 9 hours and 55 minutes.  
Ack, I get dizzy just thinking about it!

Jupiter is so big that you could fit all the other planets in the solar system inside it. 

The red spot of Jupiter is the biggest, most violent storm in the known universe -- that spot is at least three times the size of earth!

questions.question: What is HCl?
questions.answer: Hydrogen chloride (HCl) is a colorless, poisonous gas with an unpleasant, acrid odor. It is very soluble in water and readily soluble in alcohol and ether. It is not flammable, and the liquid is a poor conductor of electricity.

questions.question: Tell me a news about Virat Kohli.
questions.answer:
For Virat Kohli, his latest record-breaking moment couldn’t have been scripted any better.

As he got up off his knees, removed his helmet and took in the acclaim of the Mumbai crowd after reaching his record 50th ODI century, the India superstar looked up to his wife — movie actress Anushka Sharma — and blew her kisses.

He bowed toward Sachin Tendulkar, his cricketing hero and the man whose record he’d just broken inside the Wankhede stadium.
